body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#23618](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23618) (build, qt: Ditch `no_sdk_version_check.patch` by hebasto)
* [#23611](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23611) (build: add `LTO` option to depends by fanquake)
* [#23495](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23495) (build: Bump Fontconfig version up to 2.12.6 by hebasto)
* [#23489](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23489) (build: Qt 5.15.2 by fanquake)
* [#23340](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23340) (build: upgrade to boost 1.77 to fix c++20 compilation by PastaPastaPasta)
* [#22708](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22708) (build, qt: Add Wayland support for Linux builds with depends by hebasto)
* [#22380](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22380) (build: add and use C_STANDARD and CXX_STANDARD in depends by fanquake)
* [#21778](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21778) (POC: LLVM 13 & LLD based macOS toolchain by fanquake)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

> This PR is based on #22552, and only the last two commits belong to this one.

The dependency on #22552 could be eliminated by replacing `$(qt_file_name)` with a hardcoded value, but it will definitely bad for maintainability.
I can confirm this fixes my Android build issues. I haven't yet looked at the code.

Rebased 57aeb32d888542fba261138ae378ae9e0062c12c -> a5b568ec74528d0ea94b1ee0392d37e338c97155 ([pr22555.04](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr22555.04) -> [pr22555.05](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr22555.05)) due to the conflict with #23535.
